entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:44 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 05:04 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: ENE 26 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
